code: @Manual{,   title = {wnbaherstory: WNBA Historical Trends Package},   author = {Jane Loo and Ella Sylvester and Alina Abdulina},   year = {2024},   note = {R package version 0.1},   url = {https://sds270-f24.github.io/wnbaherstory/}, }

title: WNBA Historical Trends Package
text: wnbaherstory R package provides historical data WNBA (Women’s National Basketball Association). WNBA founded 1997 since lot changes team re-locations ownership changes different players going league. package data team win rate, attendance, team location, top high scorers. data historical can traced beginning WNBA (1997) present. User can option view historical data time, user can put parameters function specify years, players, teams want specifically look . hope package can answer historical questions WNBA also allow users see league changed grown time.

title: WNBA Historical Trends Package
text: can install development version wnbaherstory GitHub :

title: WNBA Historical Trends Package
WNBA Historical Trends Package
code: library(wnbaherstory)  # Example 1: Calculate win rate winRate("Seattle Storm") ## [1] 52.60664 # Example 2: Map WNBA teams map_WNBA_teams(year_range = 2021:2024) # Example 3: Plot WNBA attendance plot_wnba_attendance("Los Angeles Sparks")

what: Example: High Scorers of All Time
title: WNBA Historical Trends Package
code: career_ppg() # Add player names for specific players # Interactive Plot

title: WNBA Historical Trends Package
text: Jane Loo Ella Sylvester Alina Abdulina

title: All Game Attendance Data — All_Game_Attendance
text: data set contains information attendance games certain season series. includes columns game date, attendance numbers, related statistics.

title: All Game Attendance Data — All_Game_Attendance
All Game Attendance Data — All_Game_Attendance
text: data frame 6214 rows 13 variables: ...1 Number games played Year Integer. year teams played. Day Week Factor. day week teams played. Month Factor. month teams played. Day Integer. Day week teams played. Time (ET) time game played . Game Type Factor. game classified either regular season, Seminfinals, Finals, Eastern Conference Semifinals etc. Home Team Fcator. Name home team. Away Team Factor. Name away team. Arena Factor. Name arena game played . City Factor. Name city game played . State Factor. Name State game played . Attendance Integer. Number people attended game.

title: All Game Attendance Data — All_Game_Attendance
text: https://www.acrossthetimeline.com/wnba/data.html#

what: Function shows career PPG of top WNBA scorers — career_ppg
title: Function shows career PPG of top WNBA scorers — career_ppg
text: function scrapes career points per game (PPG) data specified WNBA players Basketball Reference returns interactive plot showing points scored years.

title: Function shows career PPG of top WNBA scorers — career_ppg
Function shows career PPG of top WNBA scorers — career_ppg
text: https://www.basketball-reference.com/wnba/players/

title: Function shows career PPG of top WNBA scorers — career_ppg
text: players first last name WNBA player(s)

title: Function shows career PPG of top WNBA scorers — career_ppg
text: interactive plot showing career points scored WNBA players years.

title: Function shows career PPG of top WNBA scorers — career_ppg
text: function fetches career points (PTS) year (Year) data top WNBA players, converts data numeric, visualizes using interactive plot.

title: Function shows career PPG of top WNBA scorers — career_ppg
text: Jane Loo
